Namespace osu.Framework.Bindables

Classes

AggregateBindable<T>

Combines multiple bindables into one aggregate bindable result.

BindableNumberWithCurrent<T>

A bindable which holds a reference to a bound target, allowing switching between targets and handling unbind/rebind.

BindableNumber<T>
BindableSafeArea

A subclass of Bindable<T> specifically for representing the "safe areas" of a device. It exists to prevent regular MarginPaddings from being globally cached.

BindableSize

Represents a Size bindable with defined component-wise constraints applied to it.

BindableWithCurrent<T>

A bindable which holds a reference to a bound target, allowing switching between targets and handling unbind/rebind.

Bindable<T>

A generic implementation of a IBindable

LeasedBindable<T>

A bindable carrying a mutually exclusive lease on another bindable. Can only be retrieved via BeginLease(bool).

NonNullableBindable<T>
NotifyDictionaryChangedEventArgs<TKey, TValue>

Arguments for a dictionary's CollectionChanged event.

RangeConstrainedBindable<T>
ValueChangedEvent<T>

An event fired when a value changes, providing the old and new value for reference.

Interfaces

IBindable

An interface which can be bound to other IBindables in order to watch for (and react to) Disabled changes.

IBindableDictionary<TKey, TValue>
IBindableList<T>

A readonly interface which can be bound to other IBindableList<T>s in order to watch for state and content changes.

IBindableNumber<T>
IBindableWithCurrent<T>
IBindable<T>

An interface which can be bound to other IBindable<T>s in order to watch for (and react to) Disabled and Value changes.

ICanBeDisabled

Interface for objects that have a disabled state.

IHasDefaultValue

Interface for objects that have a default value.

IHasDescription

Interface for objects that have a description.

ILeasedBindable

An interface that represents a leased bindable.

ILeasedBindable<T>

An interface that representes a leased bindable.

IParseable

Represents a class which can be parsed from an arbitrary object.

IUnbindable

Interface for objects that support publicly unbinding events or IBindables.

NotifyDictionaryChangedAction

Delegates

NotifyDictionaryChangedEventHandler<TKey, TValue>

The delegate to use for handlers that receive the CollectionChanged event.
